1: The heavens reveal amazing beauty and artistry around us.
2: Every day and night shares wisdom and understanding with me.
3: Every voice resonates and connects across all languages.
4: My words spread joy and light throughout the world.
5: I joyfully embrace new beginnings with strength and enthusiasm.
6: The sun shines brightly on everything, bringing warmth to all.
7: The law guides me toward wisdom and renewal.
8: Following wisdom brings joy and clarity to my life.
9: Respect brings lasting purity and truth in all decisions.
10: Wisdom is more valuable and sweeter than gold and honey.
11: Following guidance leads to great rewards.
12: I seek clarity and embrace personal growth.
13: I seek guidance to remain upright and innocent.
14: I express words and thoughts that uplift and inspire.
